```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("./NYBG DD Project/data//assessments.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = yearPublished)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("Histogram") +
  xlab("Year Published") +
  ylab("# of Data Deficient Entries Published(yr)")
```

```{r}
data.1998 <- filter(data, yearPublished == 1998)

clean.data.1998 <- data.1998 %>%
  select(-c(redlistCategory, redlistCriteria, assessmentDate, criteriaVersion, language, rationale, populationTrend, useTrade, yearLastSeen))

data.1998.first5 <- clean.data.1998[1:5, ]
```

```{r}
data.sample <- data[sample(nrow(data), 10), ]
View(data.sample)
```
